long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download reddit videos with sound audio and HD quality (RedditVd.com) extension is the ultimate tool for downloading videos from Reddit with sound, providing a seamless and cost-free experience.

Key Features:
- High-Quality Downloads: Easily download Reddit videos, images, and GIFs in high quality.
- Quick GIF Downloads: Save GIFs from Reddit swiftly.
- Unlimited Use: Enjoy unlimited downloads without any fees.
- Privacy-Focused: No user information is collected, ensuring your privacy.

How to Use Reddit Video Saver (RedditVd) on Chrome:
- Open Chrome: Launch your Chrome browser and navigate to Reddit.com.
- Find the Video: Locate the Reddit video you wish to download.
- Click Download: Click the "Download" button at the bottom of the post.
- Download: Wait a few seconds for the file to download to your computer.

Note: After installing the extension, reload your page to start using it.

We welcome your feedback and suggestions to improve the extension.
